name: 3-3-3 ON AN A330?! Flying Air Transat's Airbus A330-200 from Calgary to Vancouver
description:
Air Transat is a Canadian leisure airline that flies mostly to European and sun destinations from eastern Canada.

However, one thing about their aircraft stands out - they fly mostly A330s in a tight 3-3-3 configuration - and Air Transat is the only airline in mainland North America with a setup like this on an A330.

See what I thought of it on this short hop from Calgary to Vancouver!

Flight Number: TS951
Seat: 4A
Livery: New
Engines: 2x RR Trent 772B-60
Registration: C-GUBH
Route: Calgary (YYC) - Vancouver (YVR)
Callsign: TRANSAT 951 heavy
Runway used: 17R (YYC) - 26R (YVR)
Date filmed: July 2019
